name: Trade Execution Agent
description: Executes buy and sell orders on various crypto exchanges based on signals received from other agents.
author: Smart Crypto Portfolio Manager Team

capabilities.name: execute_trade
capabilities.description: Executes a cryptocurrency trade on a specified exchange

exchange.description: The exchange to execute the trade on (e.g., 'binance', 'coinbase')

order_type.description: The type of order to place

price.description: The price for limit orders (optional for market orders)

stop_price.description: The stop price for stop-limit orders

executed_price.description: The average price the order was executed at

executed_quantity.description: The quantity that was successfully executed

capabilities.name: get_order_status
capabilities.description: Gets the current status of an order

exchange.description: The exchange where the order was placed

order_id.description: The ID of the order to check

executed_price.description: The average price the order was executed at

executed_quantity.description: The quantity that was successfully executed

remaining_quantity.description: The quantity that is yet to be executed
